reviews.Title: Great device, could have been priced a little lower
reviews.Comment:
In 90Hz mode the display is really great. But does consume a bit more power.
The pics captured are really good, but I felt the default camera app to be lacking in default mode and overcomplicated in the pro mode.
The battery comfortably lasts for more than 24 hours on average use.
There is a lot of bloatware installed with the phone which I felt was slowing down the phone.
Although 5G is not rolled out in India, this device with the current price tag should have come with 5G support.
